Earvin “Magic” Johnson, is the only player in NBA History to be named NBA Finals MVP as a rookie.

In 1980, the LA Lakers beat the Philadelphia 76ers in six games to capture the NBA Title.

Magic averaged 21.5 points, 11.2 rebounds and 8.7 assists per game.
